metadata.title: 5th Grade - Week 10 - Reading
metadata.description: Practice test for 5th grade students, week 10, reading subject.
metadata.subject: reading

sections.name: Reading Comprehension
sections.subject: reading
sections.description: Reading Comprehension practice questions for 5th grade students.

questions.subject: reading
questions.questionText: What is the main idea of the passage? (Week 10, Question 1)
questions.passageText: This is a sample reading passage for 5th grade students. The passage discusses various topics relevant to students at this grade level. It contains information that students need to understand and analyze to answer the questions correctly.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is B because it best summarizes the main idea of the passage.
